CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: CHI and MOT sit down on the floor
MOT looks briefly at camera . MOT looks at CHI
MOT pats floor next to herself . MOT leans closer toward CHI
CHI shuffles upright on knees to spot MOT had indicated . CHI sits back on his heels . CHI looks at box
MOT looks at box . MOT turns the box slightly toward CHI . MOT looks at CHI
MOT sets lid of box on floor
CHI lifts book from box . CHI sets book down between himself and MOT
MOT puts lower portion of box on top of lid
MOT moves box away from herself and CHI
MOT positions book to read it to CHI
CHI sidles slightly closer to MOT
<bef> MOT points to something on cover of book . MOT looks at CHI
MOT looks back at book . MOT points to something else on book cover
MOT points to something else on book cover
MOT looks back at book . MOT points to something on cover
MOT points to something on the page
CHI leans forward slightly . CHI sits back
CHI lifts hands toward chest . CHI lowers hands back to lap
MOT points to something on page
CHI puts left hand on MOT's knee . CHI pushes off from MOT's knee and leans on right arm .
CHI swings left leg out . CHI shows MOT his shoe
CHI swings right leg out . CHI sits with both legs out in front of him
MOT points to something on the page . MOT looks at CHI
CHI looks at book . MOT looks back at book
MOT points to something on page
MOT points to something else on page
MOT gestures to something else on page
MOT points to something on page
MOT points to something on page
CHI rocks forward and then back . MOT looks at CHI
MOT looks back at book . MOT points to something on page
CHI looks at object to which MOT is pointing
MOT glances at book . MOT looks back at CHI
MOT brushes CHI affectionately under the chin . MOT looks back at book
MOT looks at book . MOT points to something on page
MOT points to something on page
MOT looks back at book . MOT points again to same thing on page

MOT points to something on page . MOT looks at CHI

MOT points to something else on page
MOT points to something on page

MOT points to something on page
CHI rolls onto his stomach and faces the book
MOT points to something on page
MOT points to something else on page
MOT points to something else on page
MOT looks back at book . MOT points to something on page
MOT picks up box for book
MOT puts book in book's box and puts lid on box .
MOT is out of camera range
MOT returns to spot near "x" on floor
MOT returns to camera view with second box
MOT and CHI sit back down
MOT sets box in front of both of them
MOT and CHI reach for Cookie Monster puppet
CHI lifts Cookie Monster puppet from box
MOT takes other puppet and puts it on her right hand
with puppeted hand , MOT points to CHI's puppet
CHI puts puppet on right hand
MOT looks at CHI . MOT and CHI outstretch their puppets to one another , with the puppets' mouths open
MOT and CHI fit open mouths of their puppets together
MOT reaches for box and moves it away from CHI
CHI touches mouth of MOT's puppet
CHI has mouth of his puppet grab lower lip of MOT's puppet .
sounds of MOT's puppet wilting under CHI's attack
MOT flutters her puppet to the floor belly up
MOT raises her puppet from floor and swoops it over CHI's knees . MOT pulls puppet closer to CHI's puppet
MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
CHI has his puppet kiss MOT's puppet
CHI makes sound of a kiss . MOT brings her puppet to CHI's cheek
CHI looks at puppets . CHI touches mouth of MOT's puppet
CHI makes sound of a kiss , has Cookie Monster give MOT's puppet a kiss
MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
CHI touches his puppet to MOT's puppet
CHI continues to touch MOT's puppet
CHI has his puppet grab MOT's puppet's nose
CHI and MOT shake their joined puppets . CHI breaks his puppet free . MOT turns her puppet to face her
MOT pulls puppet to her chest
MOT looks at CHI . MOT holds puppet out to CHI
CHI has his puppet give MOT's puppet a kiss
MOT has her puppet swoop down to Cookie Monster and kiss Cookie Monster's nose
noise of a swoop followed by a gruff affectionate kiss
CHI looks at his puppet . CHI looks at MOT
CHI pulls MOT's puppet to his and has MOT's puppet kiss his puppet
CHI makes sound of a kiss
MOT has her puppet swoop down and grasp CHI's puppet's nose in her puppet's mouth
MOT makes accompanying sighing sound . MOT has her puppet release CHI's puppet's nose and pull back
CHI waves both hands and arms up and down , making Cookie Monster puppet bob up and down
CHI again waves both arms up and down , this time with Cookie Monster's mouth open
MOT extends her puppet to CHI
CHI grasps a puppet in each hand and bounces them up and down
CHI holds puppets out to MOT
MOT puts puppets back in box
CHI walks almost out of camera view
CHI pulls box off shelf . CHI turns and walks back to MOT
CHI sets box on floor and kneels beside it
MOT holds out hand to receive box but CHI bypasses her
MOT grasps box and sets it down in front of them
MOT points to place on floor
MOT holds box while CHI removes lid
MOT holds up a sheet of paper
CHI lifts up bottom of box
MOT puts paper back in box
CHI tries to fit lid on box
CHI holds lid up . CHI looks at MOT
MOT grasps box lid and fits it onto box
MOT looks in direction of shelves
CHI runs almost out of camera view .
MOT puts box with drawing materials on top of puppet box . CHI lowers box from shelf and staggers back toward MOT
Contents of box fall out onto floor as CHI is halfway to MOT
CHI looks down at upended box contents
CHI bends to upright house . CHI grasps house
CHI struggles to set house upright . MOT lifts box out of the way
CHI is still struggling to set house upright
MOT grasps house and pulls it toward her
MOT pats carpet next to her
MOT grasps house and turns it around
CHI crawls to other side of house
MOT sets up house , opened , in front of CHI
MOT points to garage . CHI leans against MOT to look inside house . MOT reaches inside garage and pulls out car
CHI reaches out and touches car briefly
MOT pulls house slightly toward her
CHI looks down . MOT points to something in house . MOT reaches into house .
CHI moves hand from garage to middle of house . CHI may be pushing the car . MOT begins to pull items out of house .
CHI's exact hand movements are blocked by the house
CHI may still be playing with car
MOT puts bed back inside house . CHI grasps a plastic house inhabitant in each hand
CHI brings arms back . MOT points to something else in house . MOT reaches inside house again
CHI places one of the house dwellers in one of the rooms of the house
MOT pulls something out of house . MOT places object in farther segment of house . CHI plays with house-related objects placed between himself and the house . MOT pulls out a piece of house furniture
MOT shows object to CHI . MOT reaches inside farther segment of house
the house blocks his exact actions from view
MOT holds up furniture item for CHI to see . CHI looks at object MOT is holding up
MOT replaces furniture item in farther segment of house
MOT points to something on lower floor of farther segment of house
CHI reaches for object inside house
MOT reaches for something inside house . CHI reaches down
CHI brings daddy doll out of house . MOT rearranges objects in nearer segment of house
CHI reaches for something inside house
MOT pulls out an item of furniture
MOT holds up plastic bed for CHI to see
CHI grasps the plastic bed . CHI takes bed from MOT
MOT picks up bed and places it back inside house
CHI puts daddy doll in car
CHI puts a second doll somewhere inside house
MOT reaches out and touches something
house obscures view of MOT's hands
CHI reaches out and touches something
CHI begins pushing car to far side of house
CHI pushes car to other side of house . CHI lets go of car
CHI leans his head against MOT's knee and peers into garage
CHI may be tugging on garage door
CHI's hands are obscured from view by the house
CHI succeeds in shutting garage door
MOT reaches for something on floor between herself and house
CHI reaches for something near or inside house . CHI picks item up and shows it to MOT
MOT looks at object CHI displays
CHI picks up another object and puts it near or on top of item he was most recently playing with
MOT touches objects CHI is playing with
CHI pulls back and surveys the scene he has created . MOT looks at CHI
MOT looks at CHI . CHI holds item up for MOT to see
CHI puts item back in house
CHI leans toward side of house
CHI crawls to other side of house
CHI is out of camera view
camera pans back to include CHI in view
CHI reaches for door . MOT shifts to observe CHI's actions . CHI looks down
CHI shuts door . CHI pushes car back and forth
CHI removes dolls from car seats
CHI starts to put first doll back in house
CHI puts second doll in house
MOT leans toward CHI . MOT looks at CHI
CHI turns and reaches for car
CHI turns back to face camera . CHI bends down toward garage .
CHI looks down . MOT looks down
CHI struggles to lower garage door
MOT reaches out and puts a hand on top of garage
